thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel!!!
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel!!! - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Gr√©gory B
title: Wonderful hotel!!!
text:
We spent a week-end in this beautiful hotel in March 2017. Everything was perfect : our room was great and we had a small terrasse. The breakfast is excellent and guests are offered, in addition to the buffet, Italian specialties which are excellent !!!! The staff is very nice and its main objective is to have guests happy and spend a great time. And the hotel is very well located in Rome.
In summary this hotel is a great place to stay
